labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails: AssertionError: Button [Accept all cookies] is not visible after 30 sec.

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['France', 'Great Britain', 'Japan', 'Basic Materials', 'Telecommunications Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['France', 'Great Britain', 'Japan', 'Basic Materials']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Greece', 'Norway', 'Singapore', 'Basic Materials', 'Healthcare'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Singapore']
